[Groovy] Class ProcessManagementController

      • ProcessManagementController

      • ProcessManagement controller class is used for executing process actions from UI.

        Authors:
        Stephan Albers
        July Karpey
        Maria Voitovich

          • java.lang.Object sendEvent

            Send event parameters: - isStarted - processID - processType - errorController, errorAction (optional) controller and action to forward to in case of errors - resultController, resultAction (optional) controller and action to forward to in case of no errors

          • java.lang.Object startProcess

            Starts process params: - id -- process name - errorController, errorAction (optional) controller and action to forward to in case of errors - resultController, resultAction (optional) controller and action to forward to in case of no errors
